noun.description: Any of numerous rodents constituting the family Sciuridae, which comprises the true squirrels (tree squirrels, flying squirrels, ground squirrels, marmots, and related forms); a squirrel.

adjective.description: Of or relating to squirrels or the family Sciuridae; characteristic of sciurids.

origin: Early 20th century. From scientific Latin Sciurus, genus name + -id, after scientific Latin Sciuridae, family name.
